attributes.action: Stop all taxes and bills for the next 12 weeks!
attributes.additional_details:
we need help from our government, all the other countries are taking this measures, the time will come where we will all be quarantined in our homes and at that point no one will be able to pay for anything. 
All taxes and bills should be waived for 12 weeks, the UK citizens need the governments help, we cannot survive this without help, many people and small businesses will go bankrupt if the government does not do this
attributes.background: I think it's time to ask for help from our UK government and our PM Mr. Boris Johnson. We need to suspend all taxes and bills for the coming 12 weeks, people are being sent home on unpaid leave or laid off, the travel industry is collapsing, all the airline and airport employees are struggling
